lines: VIDEO OF ALDOUS’S FATHER, JONATHAN SNOW:
I wish my son all the best.
The Blackjack Dealer looks up.
Aldy?
Hey, father.
Ay!  Ay!  Everyone look ‘ere it’s my son, famous rocker Aldy Snow.
Jonathan, Aldous and Aaron walk out of the casino.
You want to hit Morton’s, grab some steaks?  You’re buying!  Cause you’re the famous rocker, not me!
Still a vegetarian, dad.

Except when it comes to the female persuasion.  Then you’re a proper carnivore.  So if you’re not going to gamble or go to a steakhouse, what do you gents feel like doing this evening?  You feel like a having proper night out?
No.
Well, I’ve got just the thing.  This is going to blow your minds.
Oh, I knew he was going to say that!
What did I tell you?
Aaron is peeing.  Jonathan walks in and goes up to the urinal  *right next to Aaron.
I have a gun.
ANGLE ON Jonathan AND ALDOUS.
It’s been a long time since we’ve done something like this.  Remember Bangkok?
How could I forget?
I just want to say it wasn’t correct of me to write an unauthorized about you.  That’s not good parenting.
I was a bastard to you, I realize that now.
How could you not be?  I was never around when you were a kid.
Mum wasn’t the easiest person to live with and what with me in and out of juvey --
Still no excuse.  You were just a boy.
Water under the bridge.  Life is too short.  We all make mistakes.  The biggest mistake is not forgiving.
It’s good to see you, boy.  It really is.
Well let me just say that I did not complete the sex!  So there!  I am high and I am not enjoying this sensation!  My heart is going like crazy!
Why is jewboy talking so much?
I’m totally having a heart attack!
Well then I wouldn’t suck on that.
Why the fuck is it called Jeffrey?
Cause who could be scared of Jeffrey?  Jeffrey’s just a nice bloke from down the road.
No you’re not.

He could be.  The Jeffrey gives people in much better shape heart attacks.  I knew this footballer who had a heart attack who had just like one puff of the Jeffrey and unlike, Jewfro, he had zero percent body fat.
I had to get my side of the story across.
You ain’t got no side.
You were a bastard as a kid and you’re a bastard now!
Ah!  Ah!  Ah!
Catwoman!  It’s Catwoman!
Aldous pulls Aaron off of Jonathan.
What the bloody fuck?  You’re like Catwoman!
